website_summaries.verdict: Brazilian virgin human hair body wave that comes in three bundles with 4 by 4 free part full lace closure.
pros: The bundles and closure are an all-natural color, which means they blend perfectly with your own hair for a great look
Silky texture with soft, full closure
Doesn't have typical bad smell like usual packed hair
Each bundle has a lot of hair
cons: May lose body wave after a few wears and washes
Some ends may have tiny bulbs

customer_reviews.title: and it came with some awesome lashes. It doesn't smell like pack hair
customer_reviews.text: The hair is very soft, the closure is full, and it came with some awesome lashes. It doesn't smell like pack hair. Very silky texture. Each bundle has a lot of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Just a review of the unpacking over all I'll give the hair 4 1/2 stars the hair is full, true to length, slickly, great price and fast delivery. I got a 10' 12' 14' and a 10' closure the hair feels amazing I can't wait to make my unit. The only thing I noticed is that chemical smell which I feel is the normal it's not strong at all so with a couple co-washes I'm sure it will be fine. I will give an up date once I make my unit!! Great hair for the price
customer_reviews.author: Mo_Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Best hair to get, doesn't require much maintenance.
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair, hands down , very soft , I had no shedding , I looked great for my 27th birthday party . thank you so much for this beautiful hair, I'm very pleased. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AsiaM

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very great hair! I’ve had it installed for about two weeks. Little to no shedding. The hair is true to length. But be aware it doesn’t hold a curl very well but besides that this is some amazing hair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hair for the price
customer_reviews.text: This hair is really nice. I sew it on my client's head.. She loved it.. The texture was really good.. Little to no shedding.. The bundles came thick..also came with closure. Which was plus... I will b ordering again..
customer_reviews.author: Sweeter

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: Really love this hair ! The texture is amazing and so soft and I LOVE THE CLOSURE❤️❤️ the only issue I have is the 10 in seems so short 🙄 but other then that I’m in love . Also no shedding
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality hair for this price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality hair for this price! Almost made me feel as though I was quoted the wrong price, LOL! I would definitely buy from this seller again. I've told so many people about this hair.
customer_reviews.author: Pascha

customer_reviews.title: Hair is soft but to many different color fibers blended ...
customer_reviews.text: Hair is soft but to many different color fibers blended in also the lace front has a lot of spit ends the curls left when I washed the hair 😡
customer_reviews.author: keshia moses

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: turned mine into a wig & i love it! i'm currently wearing it on. if you wanna see pics check out my instagram @eieshiahill
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good hair for the price
customer_reviews.text: I seen this hair and thought it would be great to practice my first wig. I really wasn’t expecting much especially for the price. But to my surprise the hair was beautiful, soft, bouncy! No smell I believe I order Monday and it came on Saturday. Haven’t experienced any tangling or shedding. I order a 10 inch closure and bundle 10,12,14
customer_reviews.author: Curisha

customer_reviews.title: 7 Months later and the wig is still great !
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this hair since may 21st and honestly this hair is GREAT . I made a wig out of it i wash it every two weeks and take care of it like its my own . This weekend im ordering hair again ONLY for a longer wig .
customer_reviews.author: Ashely Brantley

customer_reviews.title: Ok hair
customer_reviews.text: Very full. But it cannot hold a curl for a full day. Even when i added extreme holding spray ,the curls still fell. But its ok not much shedding
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Vi va voom!
customer_reviews.text: These Brazilian Virgin Hair bundles meet and exceed our expectations! Keep making great products and our girls love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sagewood

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS HAIR AND THE REVIEWS AND THE PICTURES WAS GREAT. I EVEN HAD IT DYED AND IT CAME OUT PERFECT! WILL USE THIS SITE AGAIN. NFM
customer_reviews.author: Nellie McIver

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Hair! DO NOT ORDER IT!
customer_reviews.text: This hair was horrible! It shedded so bad! It started off great, then it hair shed really bad and it did not hold the wave. I will never order this hair again!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. T

customer_reviews.title: was good
customer_reviews.text: Hair came on time. Bundles were full enough. just wish they were a lot softer. They feel more like a blend than true Brazilian.
customer_reviews.author: Kiliab

customer_reviews.title: Company did a great job with packaging
customer_reviews.text: Company did a great job with packaging. I colored the hair and made a wig. I have experienced minimal shedding and no tangling. I would purchase this hair again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the texture of the hair
customer_reviews.text: I like the texture of the hair , there's really no shedding . Closure looks full, a lot of hair on one bundle . I will be buying hair again .
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and last a long time, no shedding and no smells.
customer_reviews.author: tisheia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Long lasting, been using it for over a month now and its great! I ordered again
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Soft nice hair... No smell... No shredding....loving it so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice hair. I bought it for me, but ended up giving it to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Kellz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the hair was used for trail a first weave for my daughter good price good quality hait
customer_reviews.author: tanya

customer_reviews.title: Good for a quick style
customer_reviews.text: I brought this hair for my daughter. This hair didn't color well. Even though I sealed the wefts the shedding was still pretty bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle

customer_reviews.title: It's a really great hair I made a lace closure wig out of ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a really great hair I made a lace closure wig out of it and everybody loves it. It sheds a little but I can live with that. The hair is really soft too. The lengths I got aren't thin either. Overall a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! Looked natural.... soft... no shedding.... definitely got my money worth.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Pat

customer_reviews.title: I'll recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: This hair is so soft and beautiful. The quality is extremely good and it doesn't shed.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: This Is a great product with limited use
customer_reviews.text: This Is a great product with limited use. the curls unravel once you wash it and does not necessarily return its not a wash and wear, requires a lot of maintenance if you want to re-use, and it feels and seems like its truly is human hair.
customer_reviews.author: Wubbzy Fancy Pants

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. Ordered on Saturday received my hair on Monday
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. Ordered on Saturday received my hair on Monday. The bundles were very full, the hair was soft with some shedding but very minimal. Did a full head sew in and still had hair left. Will definitely buy again. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: lorna

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this hair. IT's really soft and my stylist didn't even use all d bundles. Thanks again❤ I would recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Pam B

customer_reviews.title: Tangle
customer_reviews.text: Hair was on it tangled ALOT and shedded a lot after a week of having it ,I just kept it up because you have to constantly brush it.
customer_reviews.author: Makendra

customer_reviews.title: This hair has done me right!!
customer_reviews.text: This hair has done me right!! It does tend to look a lol greasy but all I do is blow dry it and it has this natural look I will def order again now the wave completely disappeared after I washed the hair *minimum shedding
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: NOPE.
customer_reviews.text: All three bundles are different colors.. the closure won't lay flat .. the ends look crazy .. there are some bright red strands of hair .. smh I won't order again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My stylist was even more shocked and in love as well
customer_reviews.text: Loving the hair so far! My stylist was even more shocked and in love as well! Can’t beat the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: OMG I love this hair good quality it come on time . Best hair ever girl
customer_reviews.author: Nina Yadobi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bundles are very full hair is soft and it sheds a little but worth the price
customer_reviews.author: SymoneRae

customer_reviews.title: The hair feels great and it was a great install
customer_reviews.text: The hair feels great and it was a great install. There was a little shedding after about a week. Also, the hair has a burgundy tint which was completely fine with me, but others might want true black hair. I will buy thus product again.
customer_reviews.author: Shalonda Moore

customer_reviews.title: The length and body
customer_reviews.text: I love the hair it’s true to length it have a lot of body
customer_reviews.author: 🖤🖤🖤🖤🖤

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I will definately stick with this hair I loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I receive my hair today it was so nice and soft and full I definitely will be ordering ...
customer_reviews.text: I receive my hair today it was so nice and soft and full I definitely will be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: shaquannah

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Hair is very soft no shedding and bundles are very full I will definitely order again also package arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The hair was okay but it shed pretty bad but for the price it will work
customer_reviews.author: Two peas in a pod

customer_reviews.title: Real virgin hair
customer_reviews.text: I had it for three weeks.. a sew in. I died the hair no problem, no tangles. And I don’t know nothing bout hair so I’m surprised it lasted that long.. good hair for $50 like real virgin
customer_reviews.author: deda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hair I've ever bought. It has no smell, does not shed, and is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Resendez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price the quality is GREAT...soft and no smell
customer_reviews.author: Chell Bell

customer_reviews.title: I love this hair it came just as it was supposed ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair it came just as it was supposed to come. . It dyed well i will be ordering again thanx
customer_reviews.author: mona

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Haven't installed as yet tho
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Hair is soft and to smell or shedding. Great price. Haven't installed as yet tho.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: The hair is so nice and soft ,i have had it on for 2wks now and the texture is still the same.I absolutely love it and still getting so much compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: linda roland

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hair arrived in no time, bundles are thick can’t wait to try.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: I  am not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Hello I bought hair last month losses weavy and when I come the is coming out
customer_reviews.author: Filly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best hair I've ever purchased its so full and bouncy great grade of hair no smell curls very well with flexi rods the hair is better than i expected will order again.(excuse the pic i was playing with snapchat filters)
customer_reviews.author: Tia Citizen

customer_reviews.title: The hair is very soft and easy to manage
customer_reviews.text: Received the package on time and hair was well packaged. The hair is very soft and easy to manage. The was some smell but after washband install all is well. I love the volume and density of the hair the part is soft full. So far I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: BLACKYODA

customer_reviews.title: GET THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: GET THESE!!! I still have these and I bought these over a year ago and they are still just as soft and I use them every time I get a sew-in. Just a good wash the day you put them in(if you have bad dandruff like me you know why they need a wash). I reccomend this to anyone who asks me because this is such a good product for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Lotus Psyche

customer_reviews.title: Great hair! It does not tangle!
customer_reviews.text: It has been a month since I bought and installed this hair.. This got to be one of the best purchase I have done on hair recently. It does not tangle or mate. It doesn’t shed as well, you may have a hair or two out once in a while but I consider that normal even for natural hair. It feels smooth and light on head. I purchased 14,12 , 10 inch with 10 inch closure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price and the quality was awesome. I purchased this for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Elrica

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair , it's beautiful, silky and such a great price for the amount of bundles I received, once I finished my hair I had almost a whole bundle I didn't use..I will buy again..
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Tangle free. Dyeable. Bleachable. Great quality hair. FYI the hair is fine.
customer_reviews.author: TeKe

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The closure is nice but the hair has so many short hairs it’s ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: I'm enjoying my hair.
customer_reviews.text: This hair is very soft and pretty. I will do another review after wearing it for a while. But Beware of the type of developer you use to attempt to bleach the closure. 40 developer is no go!!! 20 or 30 is sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Charli O

customer_reviews.title: Love the body wave texture... But its gone after shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the early delivery... It was well packed... And a free weaving cap was included. Hair was gorgeous before shampooing bore install. No funny smell or anything. After shampoo and conditioner.... The body wave texture was gone. Also i had shedding but no tangling..
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Love this hair❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair! No smell!!! Got the 10,12,14,and 10 closure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great weave.
customer_reviews.text: Great weave.. The bundles were full 100grams and bouncy... perfect for wig making and wearing as a weave.. Lokks great. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Rhudo Masasi

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hair
customer_reviews.text: Had trouble getting the colour I wanted this hair to be and it lost the waves through the process but its really soft and I was able to curl it again.
customer_reviews.author: Canedia Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Not that bad after washing and conditioning she has life
customer_reviews.text: Hair is soft yet frizzy to many spit ends and fly aways haven't installed of yet but I will update soon but so far it was well worth the money and the closure is ok Update installed hair and was very disappointed after co washing body wave did not come back the hair has too many short hairs and red fibers in the bundles closure and bundles are two different colors closure is jet black bundles are natural black or 1b i knew it was too good to be true
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I MOST DEF WILL ORDER AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this hair in Feb finally installed it on my birthday and hair is beautiful And soft as cotton I'm in love
customer_reviews.author: Anita d.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a short time pinch.
customer_reviews.text: The hair is beautiful out of the package but sheds and breaks and becomes strawlike. Still not a terrible deal.
customer_reviews.author: Nenita Muneto

customer_reviews.title: Beware bleaching but okay hair
customer_reviews.text: The hair bleached okay other than almost burning when processing it. Make sure you deep condition it immediately. I made it into a wig so it will last longer. Th curls came back afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: BUYYY
customer_reviews.text: Bundles are thick, no shedding! Smells good. Fast shipping. ❤️ & great price! Loveeeeeeee it. Just got it today.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Stout

customer_reviews.title: worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the price, it doesn't shade or smell. The only thing is the closure Is short and didn't have an middle part.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loooove the hair...... Also came very fast in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: deidra

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The hair was good and full. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA ANDREWS
